_comment: Test data for validating the n8n ADO Ticket Quality workflow
_usage: Import this into a Code node to test the assessment logic without ADO connection

fields.System.Title: Implement comprehensive user authentication system with MFA support
fields.System.Description:
As an administrator, I want to provide users with a secure multi-factor authentication system so that our application meets enterprise security compliance requirements.

This feature shall implement a comprehensive user authentication system including:
  • Multi-factor authentication support using TOTP and SMS verification
  • OAuth2 integration with major providers (Google, Microsoft, GitHub)
  • Session management with configurable timeout settings and automatic logout
  • Audit logging for all authentication events with detailed timestamps

The system will integrate with our existing user management module and provide REST APIs for third-party integrations. When users navigate to the login page, they must be able to select their preferred authentication method. If MFA is enabled, the user will be prompted for a verification code after entering their password. The system should validate the code and either allow access or display an appropriate error message.

Implementation should use the existing database tables for user storage and add new tables for MFA configuration and audit logs. The API endpoints must support both JSON and form-data formats for backwards compatibility.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
• Given a user with MFA enabled, when they login successfully, then they must be prompted for a verification code
  • Given a valid verification code, when submitted within 30 seconds, then the user is authenticated
  • Given an invalid verification code, when submitted, then an error is displayed and the user can retry up to 3 times
  • Verify that users can enable MFA from account settings
  • Confirm that system supports Google, Microsoft, and GitHub OAuth providers
  • Test that sessions expire after the configurable timeout (default 30 minutes)
  • Ensure all login attempts are logged with timestamp, IP address, and outcome
  • Check that API documentation is complete and published to developer portal
  • Validate that unit test coverage exceeds 80% for all new modules
  • Verify error handling for network failures during OAuth flow
  • Test boundary conditions: maximum session length, minimum password length, rate limiting

fields.System.Title: As a user I want to reset my password when I forget it
fields.System.Description: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access to my account if I forget my credentials. The system should send me an email with a secure reset link that expires after 24 hours. When I click the link, I will be taken to a page where I can enter a new password.
fields.Microsoft.VSTS.Common.AcceptanceCriteria:
• Given a registered user, when they click 'Forgot Password', then they can enter their email address
  • Verify that user receives a password reset email within 2 minutes
  • Confirm that reset link expires after 24 hours
  • Test that user receives confirmation after successful password reset
  • Check that invalid email addresses display appropriate error message

fields.System.Title: Missing acceptance criteria user story
fields.System.Description: This user story has a reasonable description explaining what needs to be built and why it matters to the user. It includes context about the business need and technical approach.

99901.notes: Comprehensive description and AC with all quality indicators present

99902.notes: Well-structured user story with clear Given/When/Then AC

99903.notes: Missing description - capped at D, minimal AC content

99904.notes: Has description but missing AC - raw score only 24

99905.notes: Both missing - worst possible score of 0

99906.notes: Extremely short content - low raw score of 10
